## ShaderHelper.getViewMatrix() method

Gets the uniform variable of type mat4 which holds the view matrix of current camera (world space to camera space)

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getViewMatrix(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope): PBShaderExp;
```

</th><th>

</td><td>

Current shader scope


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

The view matrix of current camera
